author: jerenkrantz
msg: Start tracking the PRs for known RFC 2616 violations.  (Note that the test
cases in the PR are ridiculously hard to follow.)
These tend to be primarily in caching/proxy, but some are in the core.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Add a note from the peanut gallery.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Return 413 if chunk-ext-header is too long rather than reading from a truncated
(Previously, we'd count the unread part of the line towards the chunk.)

author: jerenkrantz
msg: If mod_mime_magic does not know the content-type, do not attempt to guess.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Add an example of what a good, trusted signature looks like.
